title: Marathons ranked by number of finishers worldwide 2016
summary: This chart shows the Marathons ranked by in the number competirion .
\\n From the chart we see that the Tokyo_JPN Cities made the Marathons finishers by some margin , with only 20617 .
Paris_FRA and New_York_City_U.S. made a respectable 41708 and 51388 finishers , with Los_Angeles_U.S. and London_GBR not far behind , at 20617 and 39072 respectively .
gold: The statistic shows a ranking of marathons worldwide by the total number of finishers in 2016 . In 2016 , the New York Marathon had a total of 51,388 finishers .
